I am worried that her Q may be over the top, but for the attack speed/damage side:
"Passive: Applying Frost Shot grants Focus for 4 seconds, stacking 5 times.

Active: Consumes all Focus to grant 20/30/40/50/60% Attack Speed and increase Frost Shot's slow by 20% for 4 seconds. If 5 stacks are consumed, Ashe's basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows resulting in [.23/.24/.25/.26/.27 Total AD per arrow for a total of 1.15/1.20/1.25/1.30/1.35 Total AD per basic attack] physical damage per attack for the duration."

Most of the time Ashe will have less slow until she hits level 16 or she is using her Ranger's Focus past level 4, which only lasts for 4 seconds, and has an 18 second cool down at the moment.

Honestly, with all the dashes in league, I don't think it will be overpowered, and instead be a way to kite tanks which is what she was designed to do from the beginning (along with everyone else, but then mass dash/blinks happened).

Another reason it probably won't be as much of a problem on Ashe, is because she is fairly squishy, and an Assassin can make short work of her before she can escape, while Skarner can be rather tanky.
